channel.title: Question about the status page
channel.description:
So, I'm thinking of starting my server again ;D but there's 1 thing bothering me.. Is the status page similar to RuneLocus's one? (The one i dislike) Cause if it takes 2 weeks to get the server on 1st page then i won't be starting my server cause it's gonna take ages to get players. Can someone explain me how it works, like how long do you need to wait till it's on 1st page or 2nd. If i use server restarter, will it get out of the status page once it's restarted?
Thanks :)

item.title: Question about the status page
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

I don’t see any explanation on how it works.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about the status page
item.dc:creator: @_ikram _ikram
item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

Yet another who doesnt use the search:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363862.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Question about the status page
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

When you put your server on the status page, it starts at 100% uptime and gradually decreases when your server is not running. If you leave your server running all the time, its uptime will never decrease.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about the status page
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

But it doesn’t take a lot of time to get 100% uptime and go to the first page, right?

Read full topic

item.title: Question about the status page
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

It still appears to be ranked by uptime, as it was before the update.

Read full topic
